name: Pendaflex
overview:
Pendaflex makes organizational solutions with style and flow because we know you’re busy, successful and on the go.

We make it easier for people to organize the modern workplace. Using our products enables people to become more efficient and productive, while expressing their professionalism & personality with innovative functionality and superior design.

Pendaflex is the number one brand in filing products, and the premier brand in North America of the Esselte Group.

The Esselte Group is one of the world’s premier manufacturers of organizational solutions. Esselte is a $1 billion office products company with subsidiaries in 31 countries and distribution in more than 120 countries. The company’s products are sold in Europe primarily under the Esselte®, Leitz® and Rapid® brands and in North America primarily under the Pendaflex®, Oxford®, Xyron®, Rapid®, Boorum & Pease® and Ampad™ brands.
